SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_INTERACTION_GETSUBCATEGORYGROUP
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Used to retrieve a table of the interaction categories and subcategories used for a sponsor
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_INTERACTION_GETSUBCATEGORYGROUP ( @categoryGroup nvarchar(50) ) returns @interactionsubcategories table ( interactionCategoryID uniqueidentifier, interactionSubcategoryID uniqueidentifier ) with execute as caller as begin insert @interactionsubcategories select cat.interactionCategoryID, subcat.ID as interactionSubcategoryID from dbo.USR_UFN_INTERACTION_GETCATEGORYGROUP (@categoryGroup) cat join dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY subcat on subcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = cat.interactionCategoryID
return end
